item.title: Titlebar - Large Subtitle - Simple
item.content:encoded: [vc_row row_section_padding="padding-top:triple" columns_animation="scale-up" columns_animation_duration="1000" columns_animation_delay="500"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="`{`omnis_title`}`" heading_container="h1" heading_typography="size-class:h3-size"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="`{`omnis_subtitle`}`" heading_container="h2" heading_typography="font-weight:700|size-class:h1-alt"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
